title: Non-congruence presentations of finite simple groups
authors: William Y. Chen, Alexander Lubotzky, and Pham Huu Tiep
abstract:
We prove two results on some special generators of finite simple groups and
use them to prove that every non-abelian finite simple group $S$ admits a
non-congruence presentation (as conjectured in [CLT24]), and that if $S$ has a
non-trivial Schur multiplier, then it admits a smooth cover (as conjectured in
[CFLZ]).
